noun.description: A large luxury car that is the most prestigious brand of General Motors.
Something that is an outstanding example of its kind, especially in terms of luxury, quality, or size.
examples: the aircraft is widely regarded as the Cadillac of commuter planes

origin: From the name of the French explorer Antoine de La Mothe Cadillac (1658–1730), who founded the city of Detroit, where the cars are manufactured­.
